name: Daily Gratitude
description: Reflect on what you're grateful for today

onSelect.message: Let's take a moment to appreciate the good things... 🙏

onStart.message: Gratitude makes everything brighter. What are you thankful for today?

onComplete.message: Your gratitude is beautiful! Feel that warm glow? ✨

onSave.message: Gratitude recorded! May your blessings multiply 🌟

sections.title: Things I'm grateful for
sections.placeholder: List at least three things you're grateful for today...

onStart.message: Start with the first blessing that comes to mind... 💫

onComplete.message: These are wonderful! Count your blessings indeed! 🌟

hints: Think about people who made your day better
What small comforts brought you joy?
What do you often take for granted?
What challenge taught you something valuable?
What made you feel safe or loved today?

50.message: Your heart is opening! Keep going... 💝

100.message: So many blessings! Your gratitude is radiant! ✨

sections.title: Why they matter
sections.placeholder: Reflect on the meaning behind your gratitude...

onStart.message: Let's go deeper... why do these things matter to you? 💭

onComplete.message: This reflection is so meaningful. You're building wisdom! 🌱

hints: How do these blessings align with your values?
What would life be like without them?
How do they make you feel?
What patterns do you notice in what you're grateful for?

80.message: This depth of reflection is powerful! 💎

sections.title: Tomorrow's intention
sections.placeholder: What gratitude practice will you focus on tomorrow?

onStart.message: Let's set a positive intention for tomorrow 🌅

onSkip.message: That's okay! Today's gratitude is enough 😊

hints: Perhaps notice gratitude in the small moments?
Maybe express gratitude to someone directly?
Could you find gratitude in a challenge?
What if you started your day with gratitude?
